data.name: Authoring_InvalidJsonElementInLocalizationFile
data.value: "templatestrings.json" file should only contain elements with type "string". Remove elements that are not strings.

data.name: Authoring_InvalidManualInstructionLocalizationIndex
data.value: In templatestrings.json file under the post action with "id" "{1}", there are localized strings for manual instruction(s) with ids "{0}". These manual instructions do not exist in the template.json file and should be removed from templatestrings.json file.
data.comment: {0} is a list of single-word identifier strings separated by comma. Such as "myManualInstruction, someUserPickedText, instruction3". {1} is a single-word identifier string. Such as "myPostAction".

data.name: Authoring_InvalidPostActionLocalizationIndex
data.value: Post action(s) with id(s) "{0}" specified in the localization file do not exist in the template.json file. Remove the localized strings from the templatestrings.json file.
data.comment: {0} is a list of single-word identifier strings separated by comma. Such as "myManualInstruction, someUserPickedText, instruction3".

data.name: Authoring_InvalidRegex
data.value: '{0}' could not be parsed as a regular expression

data.name: Authoring_MalformedPostActionManualInstructions
data.value: One or more postActions have a malformed or missing manualInstructions value.

data.name: Authoring_ManualInstructionIdIsNotUnique
data.value: Id of the manual instruction "{0}" at index {1} is not unique. Only the first manual instruction that uses this id will be localized.
data.comment: {0} is any identifier string that user provided in the file. Such as: "myInstruction", "firstInstruction", "instruction1" etc. {1} is a whole number representing the zero-based index of the manual instruction. Such as "5", or "0".

data.name: Authoring_MissingValue
data.value: Missing '{0}'.

data.name: Authoring_NonBoolDataTypeForRegexMatch
data.value: A non-bool DataType was specified for a regexMatch type symbol

data.name: Authoring_PostActionIdIsNotUnique
data.value: Id of the post action "{0}" at index {1} is not unique. Only the first post action that uses this Id will be localized.
data.comment: {0} is any identifier string that user provided in the file. Such as "myPostAction", "firstPostAction", "postAction1" etc. {1} is a number representing the zero-based index of the post action. Such as "5", or "0".

data.name: Authoring_PostActionMustHaveActionId
data.value: Post action at index {0} should have an "actionId" to declare the action to be executed.
data.comment: {0} is a whole number representing the zero-based index of the post action. Such as "5" or "0". Do not localize: actionId

data.name: Authoring_SourceDoesNotExist
data.value: Source '{0}' in template does not exist.

data.name: Authoring_SourceIsOutsideInstallSource
data.value: Source location '{0}' is outside the specified install source location.

data.name: Authoring_SourceMustBeDirectory
data.value: Source must be a directory, but '{0}' is a file.

data.name: Authoring_TemplateMissingCommonInformation
data.value: The template configuration {0} is missing common information:

data.name: Authoring_TemplateNotInstalled
data.value: Failed to load template from {0}:

data.name: Authoring_TemplateNotInstalled_Message
data.value: Failed to load template from {0}. Details: {1}

data.name: Authoring_TemplateRootOutsideInstallSource
data.value: The template root is outside the specified install source location.

data.name: RunnableProjectGenerator_Exception_ConfigShouldBeFile
data.value: Template configuration must be a file, but {0} is not a file.

data.name: RunnableProjectGenerator_Exception_LocaleConfigShouldBeFile
data.value: Template localization configuration must be a file, but {0} is not a file.

data.name: RunnableProjectGenerator_Exception_TemplateValidationFailed
data.value: The template configuration {0} is not valid.

data.name: RunnableProjectGenerator_Exception_TemplateVersionNotSupported
data.value: The template is not compatible with generator version: allowed versions: {0}, generator version: {1}.

data.name: SimpleConfigModel_AuthoringException_MergeConfiguration_FileNotFound
data.value: Failed to load additional configuration file {0}, the file does not exist.

data.name: SimpleConfigModel_AuthoringException_MergeConfiguration_InvalidFileName
data.value: Failed to load additional configuration file {0}. Additional configuration file names must end with '.{1}'.
